articles.title: Microsoft’s New Xbox Generative AI Tech Sparks Widespread Backlash - Forbes
articles.description: Microsoft is going all in on AI on multiple fronts from OpenAI to DALL-E, but now that it’s creeping into its video game division, some new alarm bells are going off in the industry.
